thread.title: Marjorie Brown
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Marjorie Brown

author: Marjorie Brown
title: Marjorie Brown
text: Would recommend Country Attire without a doubt, I bought myself a Barbour jacket in the January sale & it came next day , which was great as there was no delivery charge. Wouldn't hesitate to buy from Country Attire again.
